Level 57
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 57
By Y.K. TAN on Tuesday, June 1, 2004 - 09:28 pm:

Stage 57

Go to the right of the screen and box your way up to the ledge and make sure when the joker is on your left and as well as the ghost is on the top, drop down to obtain the key.

Go back to the right and this time, climb up again. See those gaps? If so, just box in them to prevent the ghost from coming, and if possible, just throw in a box in the direction of flight of the jokers to change the flight pattern of the jokers.

After all is done, just that you have boxes to walk on, jump over the jokers and go to the left and box all the way up.

Stand on the metal block and after that, face left and make a box to block the projectiles of the ducken. Make boxes in those gaps while remembering the block the ducken's projectiles and head for the exit.
